channel.description: Recent content in deja vu on Life At The Circus

item.title: Looking Out My Back Window
item.description:
I glanced out my back window on Saturday and saw this
Only, I didn’t just see this precious moment in time, but simultaneously, my mind flashed back to several other similar moments over the past 5 years…. September 2009
August 2008
And, April 2007
One can’t help but notice a few things when observing these father/child bonding moments in the back yard. 1. Believe it or not Scott, we’ve been VERY successful in growing grass in our backyard these past 5 years!
